ref.title: Thermodynamic properties of mixtures containing ionic liquids. Activity coefficients at infinite dilution of polar solutes in 4-methyl-N-butyl-pyridinium tetrafluoroborate using gas liquid chromatography
ref.full: Heintz, A.; Kulikov, D. V.; Verevkin, S. P. (2002) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 34, 1341-1347.
